books.title: Anatomy of the State
books.author: Murray N. Rothbard
books.description: Anatomy of the State gives a succinct account of Rothbard’s view of the state. Rothbard regards the state as a predatory entity. It does not produce anything but rather steals resources from those engaged in production...

books.title: Economics in One Lesson
books.author: Henry Hazlitt
books.description: This is probably the most important economics book ever written, in the sense that it offers the greatest hope to educating everyone about the meaning of the science.

books.title: Human Action
books.author: Ludwig von Mises
books.description: Mises's Human Action is the best defense of capitalism ever written...
